Package ca.cgjennings.spelling.ui

Class PopupMenuFactory

java.lang.Object
ca.cgjennings.spelling.ui.PopupMenuFactory
public class PopupMenuFactory extends Object
Creates pop-up menus for spelling components. Setting a non-null builder allows the default menus for spelling components to be customized.
Since:
3.0

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    static MenuBuilder
    getDefaultMenuBuilder()
    Returns the menu builder used to customize the default menu.
    static MenuBuilder
    getMisspellMenuBuilder()
    Returns the menu builder used to customize the misspell menu.
    static void
    setDefaultMenuBuilder​(MenuBuilder mb)
    Returns the menu builder used to customize the default menu used when the selected word is spelled correctly.
    static void
    setMisspellMenuBuilder​(MenuBuilder mb)
    Returns the menu builder used to customize the misspell menu used when the selected word is not in the dictionary.

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • setDefaultMenuBuilder

      public static void setDefaultMenuBuilder​(MenuBuilder mb)
      Returns the menu builder used to customize the default menu used when the selected word is spelled correctly.
      Parameters:
      mb - the new default menu builder, or null to use the default menu

      public static void setMisspellMenuBuilder​(MenuBuilder mb)
      Returns the menu builder used to customize the misspell menu used when the selected word is not in the dictionary.
      Parameters:
      mb - the new misspell menu builder, or null to use the misspell menu
